dct_title_s: [Maps of the ancient world and the posterity of Noah]
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Statute miles".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes index: Explanation of the figures of reference.
Descriptive text throughout and below, e.g.: General divisions of the ancient world, with their modern names.
